title: E-Commerce Website
description: Developed a full e-commerce platform in PHP
Product listings with user authentication and order management
Admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and users
Session-based cart with quantity updates and Stripe payment integration
Product search and filtering for a better user experience
Used MySQL for efficient data storage and backend operations

title: Movie Reservation System
description: Built a Laravel-based movie reservation system
Seat selection, showtime booking, and Google OAuth login for secure authentication
Stripe integration for secure online payments
PDF ticket generation using DomPDF with a custom layout
One-click ticket download functionality
Responsive UI developed using Tailwind CSS
Backend managed with MySQL, RESTful routes, and Blade templating

title: Food Ordering Platform
description: Built a Laravel-based food ordering application
User authentication, session-based cart, and real-time API integration
Admin panel to manage products, orders, and users
Cash on Delivery (COD) checkout implementation
Responsive UI designed with Bootstrap and JavaScript
Optimized MySQL queries for smooth performance and scalability

title: URL Shortening API
description: Built a RESTful URL shortening API using Laravel
Implemented token authentication for secure access
Optimized database performance for high-speed redirection
Integrated link usage analytics for tracking and insights
Designed clean and scalable API architecture using Laravel best practices

title: Laravel Blog Website
description: Built a full-featured blog platform using Laravel
Dynamic content management and secure user login system
Developed an admin panel for creating, updating, and deleting posts
Integrated email notifications to alert users about new blog updates
Utilized Blade templates for dynamic frontend rendering
Managed data storage and relationships using MySQL

title: Job Portal Web Application
description: Developed a full-stack job portal using React for frontend and Laravel for backend
Implemented user registration for job seekers with secure Laravel Sanctum authentication
Enabled real-time job search and filtering for improved user experience
Designed a fully responsive UI using Tailwind CSS
Managed backend logic and data with Laravel and MySQL
Separate frontend and backend repositories for clean architecture
